featured.text: Overall, many moral lessons from the last match are highlighted.
The moral lesson is that slow and steady wins the race.
The moral lesson is “First 35 your strengths, and then change the playing field to suit them.”
The moral lesson is that 33 and consistent will always beat slow and steady.

definition.zh_def: 道德的，關於正確與錯誤的標準或原則。
definition.en_def: Concerned with principles of right and wrong behavior.
definition.example: It is important to teach children about moral values.
